verses.verse: And I looked, <S%G3708><s%> and behold, <S%G2400><s%> the Lamb <S%G721><s%> [was] standing <S%G2476><s%> on Mount <S%G3735><s%> Zion, <S%G4622><s%> and with Him one <S%G1540><s%> hundred <S%G1540><s%> and forty-four thousand, <S%G5505><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> His name <S%G3686><s%> and the name <S%G3686><s%> of His Father <S%G3962><s%> written <S%G1125><s%> on their foreheads. <S%G3359><s%>

And I heard <S%G191><s%> a voice <S%G5456><s%> from heaven, <S%G3772><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> the sound <S%G5456><s%> of many <S%G4183><s%> waters <S%G5204><s%> and like <S%G5613><s%> the sound <S%G5456><s%> of loud <S%G3173><s%> thunder, <S%G1027><s%> and the voice <S%G5456><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> [was] like <S%G5613><s%> [the sound] of harpists <S%G2790><s%> playing <S%G2789><s%> on their harps. <S%G2788><s%>

And they sang <S%G103><s%> a new <S%G2537><s%> song <S%G5603><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%> and before <S%G1799><s%> the four <S%G5064><s%> living <S%G2226><s%> creatures <S%G2226><s%> and the elders; <S%G4245><s%> and no <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> could <S%G1410><s%> learn <S%G3129><s%> the song <S%G5603><s%> except <S%G1508><s%> the one <S%G1540><s%> hundred <S%G1540><s%> and forty-four thousand <S%G5505><s%> who had been purchased <S%G59><s%> from the earth. <S%G1093><s%>

These <S%G3778><s%> are the ones who <S%G3739><s%> have not been defiled <S%G3435><s%> with women, <S%G1135><s%> for they have kept themselves <S%G1510><s%> chaste. <S%G3933><s%> These <S%G3778><s%> [are] the ones who follow <S%G190><s%> the Lamb <S%G721><s%> wherever <S%G3699><s%> <S%G302><s%> He goes. <S%G5217><s%> These <S%G3778><s%> have been purchased <S%G59><s%> from among <S%G575><s%> men <S%G444><s%> as first <S%G536><s%> fruits <S%G536><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> and to the Lamb. <S%G721><s%>
And no <S%G3756><s%> lie <S%G5579><s%> was found <S%G2147><s%> in their mouth; <S%G4750><s%> they are blameless. <S%G299><s%>

And I saw <S%G3708><s%> another <S%G243><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> flying <S%G4072><s%> in midheaven, <S%G3321><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> an eternal <S%G166><s%> gospel <S%G2098><s%> to preach <S%G2097><s%> to those <S%G3588><s%> who live <S%G2521><s%> on the earth, <S%G1093><s%> and to every <S%G3956><s%> nation <S%G1484><s%> and tribe <S%G5443><s%> and tongue <S%G1100><s%> and people; <S%G2992><s%>

and he said <S%G3004><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%> "Fear <S%G5399><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> and give <S%G1325><s%> Him glory, <S%G1391><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> the hour <S%G5610><s%> of His judgment <S%G2920><s%> has come; <S%G2064><s%> and worship <S%G4352><s%> Him who made <S%G4160><s%> the heaven <S%G3772><s%> and the earth <S%G1093><s%> and sea <S%G2281><s%> and springs <S%G4077><s%> of waters."

And another <S%G243><s%> angel, <S%G32><s%> a second <S%G1208><s%> one, <S%G1208><s%> followed, <S%G190><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Fallen, <S%G4098><s%> fallen <S%G4098><s%> is Babylon <S%G897><s%> the great, <S%G3173><s%> she who <S%G3739><s%> has made <S%G4222><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the nations <S%G1484><s%> drink <S%G4222><s%> of the wine <S%G3631><s%> of the passion <S%G2372><s%> of her immorality. <S%G4202><s%>"

And another <S%G243><s%> angel, <S%G32><s%> a third <S%G5154><s%> one, <S%G5154><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> them, saying <S%G3004><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%> "If <S%G1487><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> worships <S%G4352><s%> the beast <S%G2342><s%> and his image, <S%G1504><s%> and receives <S%G2983><s%> a mark <S%G5480><s%> on his forehead <S%G3359><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> upon his hand, <S%G5495><s%>

he also <S%G2532><s%> will drink <S%G4095><s%> of the wine <S%G3631><s%> of the wrath <S%G2372><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> which is mixed <S%G2767><s%> in full <S%G194><s%> strength <S%G194><s%> in the cup <S%G4221><s%> of His anger; <S%G3709><s%> and he will be tormented <S%G928><s%> with fire <S%G4442><s%> and brimstone <S%G2303><s%> in the presence <S%G1799><s%> of the holy <S%G40><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> and in the presence <S%G1799><s%> of the Lamb. <S%G721><s%>

"And the smoke <S%G2586><s%> of their torment <S%G929><s%> goes <S%G305><s%> up forever <S%G165><s%> and ever; <S%G165><s%> and they have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> rest <S%G372><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> and night, <S%G3571><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who worship <S%G4352><s%> the beast <S%G2342><s%> and his image, <S%G1504><s%> and whoever <S%G1487><s%> <S%G5100><s%> receives <S%G2983><s%> the mark <S%G5480><s%> of his name. <S%G3686><s%>"

Here <S%G5602><s%> is the perseverance <S%G5281><s%> of the saints <S%G40><s%> who keep <S%G5083><s%> the commandments <S%G1785><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> and their faith <S%G4102><s%> in Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

And I heard <S%G191><s%> a voice <S%G5456><s%> from heaven, <S%G3772><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Write, <S%G1125><s%> 'Blessed <S%G3107><s%> are the dead <S%G3498><s%> who die <S%G599><s%> in the Lord <S%G2962><s%> from now <S%G737><s%> on!'" "Yes, <S%G3483><s%>" says <S%G3004><s%> the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> "that they may rest <S%G373><s%> from their labors, <S%G2873><s%> for their deeds <S%G2041><s%> follow <S%G190><s%> with them."

And I looked, <S%G3708><s%> and behold, <S%G2400><s%> a white <S%G3022><s%> cloud, <S%G3507><s%> and sitting <S%G2521><s%> on the cloud <S%G3507><s%> [was] one <S%G3664><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> a son <S%G5207><s%> of man, <S%G444><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> a golden <S%G5552><s%> crown <S%G4735><s%> on His head, <S%G2776><s%> and a sharp <S%G3691><s%> sickle <S%G1407><s%> in His hand. <S%G5495><s%>

And another <S%G243><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> out of the temple, <S%G3485><s%> crying <S%G2896><s%> out with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> to Him who sat <S%G2521><s%> on the cloud, <S%G3507><s%> "Put <S%G3992><s%> in your sickle <S%G1407><s%> and reap, <S%G2325><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> the hour <S%G5610><s%> to reap <S%G2325><s%> has come, <S%G2064><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> the harvest <S%G2326><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%> is ripe. <S%G3583><s%>"
And He who sat <S%G2521><s%> on the cloud <S%G3507><s%> swung <S%G906><s%> His sickle <S%G1407><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> the earth; <S%G1093><s%> and the earth <S%G1093><s%> was reaped. <S%G2325><s%>

And another <S%G243><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> out of the temple <S%G3485><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is in heaven, <S%G3772><s%> and he also <S%G2532><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> a sharp <S%G3691><s%> sickle. <S%G1407><s%>

And another <S%G243><s%> angel, <S%G32><s%> the one who has <S%G2192><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> fire, <S%G4442><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> out from the altar; <S%G2379><s%> and he called <S%G5455><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> to him who had <S%G2192><s%> the sharp <S%G3691><s%> sickle, <S%G1407><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Put <S%G3992><s%> in your sharp <S%G3691><s%> sickle, <S%G1407><s%> and gather <S%G5166><s%> the clusters <S%G1009><s%> from the vine <S%G288><s%> of the earth, <S%G1093><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> her grapes <S%G4718><s%> are ripe. <S%G187><s%>"

And the angel <S%G32><s%> swung <S%G906><s%> his sickle <S%G1407><s%> to the earth, <S%G1093><s%> and gathered <S%G5166><s%> [the clusters from] the vine <S%G288><s%> of the earth, <S%G1093><s%> and threw <S%G906><s%> them into the great <S%G3173><s%> wine <S%G3025><s%> press <S%G3025><s%> of the wrath <S%G2372><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And the wine <S%G3025><s%> press <S%G3025><s%> was trodden <S%G3961><s%> outside <S%G1855><s%> the city, <S%G4172><s%> and blood <S%G129><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> out from the wine <S%G3025><s%> press, <S%G3025><s%> up to the horses' bridles, <S%G5469><s%> for a distance <S%G575><s%> of two <S%G1812><s%> hundred miles. <S%G4712><s%>
